EmailTemplate.subject: 9/14 Webinar Reminder - Why Domain-Driven Design and Reactive Programming?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/domain-driven-design-and-reactive-programming]]> Thank you for registering for our tomorrow's webinar Why Domain Driven Design and Reactive Programming? Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, September 14, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 11:00AM PDT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1251955/6F33E3338798D58C91944C929006B00C]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
